dataIdInfo.idPurp: Examine edited data for valid attributes and spatial relationships.
dataIdInfo.idAbs: The NYSDOT Validations Toolbox is a set of tools that examine the NYSDOT ELRS for valid attributes and spatial relationship integrity. The tools take advantage of the ArcGIS Data Reviewer extension (license required), SQL scripts, and Python scripts. The data must be stored in a versioned enterprise SQL Server geodatabase for the tools to function correctly. All validation results are written to a Data Reviewer workspace.
